_sText:
Surf_badlands by [UDel]Steve

This is my first map release for CS:S.  This map should be played on 66 and 100 tick servers, some of the surf may not be possible on a 33 tick server. The map has some fairly challenging surf, and also a few secrets. The jail, weapon spawners, weapon rings, and teleporters were all made from scratch. If you're curious as to how I made them, or have any other questions, my email is petfield@gmail.com

Also, the map is decompile protected.

Thanks!

r1 Update Fixes:
Made it harder to shoot through glass at spawn
Added more surf
Changed skybox texture to make ramps more visible
Changed jail kill mechanisms a little bit, the boxes go under the floor now
